title: Toxic Flask
summaries: The Toxic Flask is a Hardmode, post-Plantera magic weapon that throws a flask with low velocity and a heavy arc that explodes into a cluster of small, damaging toxic clouds upon colliding with an enemy or surface. The clouds last for one to two seconds and cannot pass through blocks. The Toxic Flask has a 1/40 (2.5%) / 79/1600 (4.94%) chance to be dropped from Dr. Man Flies during the Solar Eclipse event.

statistics.Sell: 10 GC
